newsitem.title: USA: U.S. barge rates remain lightly quoted on call.
newsitem.headline: U.S. barge rates remain lightly quoted on call.

text.p: U.S. barge rates remained lightly quoted at the St. Louis Merchants Exchange on Tuesday. No barges traded versus none on Monday.
- Two barges, St Louis, Mississippi, this week, no bid, offer 105 percent, down five percentage points.
- Two barges, Lower Ohio River, next week, bid at 110 percent of tariff, unchanged, offered at 120 percent, up five percentage points.
- One barge, Cincinnati, Ohio River, on station, no bid, offered 125 percent.
- One barge, Fiber Lift, Memphis, $500 switch, on station, no bid, offered 100 percent.
